name: Bufinder
tag_list: business-search, business-profiles, business-directory, goods-services, investments, auctions, business-partnerships, business-promotion, business-statistics, market-analysis, business-advertising, ratings-reviews, business-services
overview:
The Project Bufinder.com is the global business search, promotion and linking tool, developed with the purpose to realize an idea of providing any business with the maximal internet-oriented support on management and advancement in any geographical scales.

The unique feature of the Project is the given possibility for his participants to form not only actually the global database of businesses with their goods, investments, auctions and tenders and the aggregate of other parameters but also all concomitant reference business information which constitutes descriptions of one or another business that promotes flexibility and scaleableness of the Project.

The Project is also directed for help in establishment and maintenance of partner relations between businesses and organization of business networks.

We combined the wide set of business services with functions intended for any man, who searches some businesses, goods and services, reviews etc.

external_links.title: Bufinder.com - Global business search, promotion and linking
